title: Samsung brings its nifty “Object Eraser” tool to the Galaxy S10 series
content:
With the Galaxy S21 last year, Samsung introduced a new feature called Object Eraser. The feature lets you easily remove unwanted people, objects, light reflections, etc., from a photo. So far, the feature has been exclusive to Samsung’s new flagship phones such as the Galaxy S21 series, Galaxy Z Fold 3, and Galaxy S22 series.

The post Samsung brings its nifty “Object Eraser” tool to the Galaxy S10 series appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung has rolled out a new update to its Photo Editor app which brings the Object Eraser tool to the Galaxy S10 models.
